reviewDetails.comment: She is excellent
Her examination was very thorough very polite and has lots of patience answers all your questions. I will recommend her to anyone.
A consistently exceptional experience. Very short wait times. Professional team, engaging, thorough. Dr. Park explains tests and procedures as well as outcomes and evaluations.
Dr. Park was incredibly thorough, patient, and approachable.  She took time to answer all my questions and made sure all my concerns were addressed.  I'd definitely recommend her to others.

Dr. Park was very personal and caring.  She was very thorough throughout.  And she was very empathetic to the concerns/complaints I was sharing.  The symptoms could be nothing to doctor's point of view however, it feels good as a patient that you are being heard no matter what.

reviewDetails.comment: He was through and explained things that other doctors did not.
hands down one of the best doctor I have been to! Good beside manner and listen and wants to learn more about your visit rather than just quickly moving along.

Dr. Khan is very knowledgeable and was able to help with my gastro issues.
very diligent Dr.

Dr. Kahn is extremely detailed , compassionate, brilliant and so easy to talk to.
He explains everything in detail and on a drawing of the gastrointestinal system.
I have recommended him to my family members and they feel the same way. On both the exam and follow up visits and the colonoscopy and endoscopy procedures.

We are blessed to have him as our doctor.
Dr. Khan has a very good straight forward bedside manner.  He is pragmatic and helpful in his recommendations for how to proceed with diagnoses treatments.
I have had my first visit with Doctor Khan for a consultation.  He seemed to understand my condition and, with patience, he explained all the options for treatment and answered all my questions.

Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment: Great visit.  She is very knowledgable and explained things very clearly.  She took her time with me and I did not feel at all rushed.  Highly recommend.
Dr. Milam had a great bedside manner and appreciated her listening to my questions/concerns and provided detailed responses and instructions on what to do.
Dr. Milam knew exactly what she was talking about. She was very nice, kind and helped me figure out next steps for what I need.
She’s amazing
